title: Tom Grafton Vs The Environmentalists
description: What happens when you tell a wounded ex-soldier that the freedom, beauty and values that he fought for are 'unsustainable' and need to be abolished? Well, the environmentalists in Tom's architecture class are about to find out.After being wounded in Iraq, Lt. Tom Grafton reluctantly accepts his medical discharge from the Australian Army. He returns to civilian life broken and without purpose.He finally starts getting his life back together as he develops a passion for three things; a smart and sassy doctor; beautiful, traditional architecture; and the serenity and skill of deer hunting.So what will Tom do when each of these is threatened or mocked?
author: David Alexander Greentree
